name: Deep Dive Fishing (Ludum Dare 48)
description:
Controls/Tips:Left and Right arrow keys to move.Constantly press (aka spam) Left or Right to fight against fish.

Deep Dive Fishing is a simple yet pretty fun game where you control a hook to catch colorful and vibrant fish as you head deeper and deeper into the blue sea. This game was made for "Ludum Dare 48" so make sure to rate this game and others on the website. If you want to see more of my content the make sure to check out my YouTube channel.

Credits:

Music By NicoleMarieT

Game by Jarron Polonio
